item.description:
Many of you work from home, and were hoping to schedule a lunch with the group to get out and meet other people who work from home to share the joys and frustrations. This meetup is for you!

Also, anyone who works in Portland and can sneak away for an hour to join us, please do! It's often nice just to get out for a few minutes, socialize, make new contacts, and have some good food!

Click on the link below to check out their lunch menu!
http://www.theoldport...

Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is under Rebecca. I will arrive 10 minutes early, and will be either right outside or in the waiting area (depending on the weather). My picture is on the front page of meetup.
item.name: Social Lunch - Old Port Sea Grill
